mapper.insert: insert into category (category_id, category_parent_id, category_name, category_code, category_sort, customize_attribute) values (#{category_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{category_parent_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{category_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{category_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{category_sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{customize_attribute,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update category set category_parent_id = #{category_parent_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, category_name = #{category_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category_code = #{category_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category_sort = #{category_sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, customize_attribute = #{customize_attribute,jdbcType=INTEGER} where category_id = #{category_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select category_id, category_parent_id, category_name, category_code, category_sort, customize_attribute from category where category_id = #{category_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select category_id, category_parent_id, category_name, category_code, category_sort, customize_attribute from category
